name: Fireboy and Watergirl: Escape - Addicting Endless Running Game
name_original: Fireboy and Watergirl: Escape - Addicting Endless Running Game
description:
Legendary PC game Fireboy and Watergirl is now on App Store as a different version!

Can you operate two characters at once? Get this odd couple to the escape but don't forget that water kills Fireboy, fire kills Watergirl!
